narration.en:
Welcome to Amazon.ca! You can see the wide range of categories Amazon offers.
Let's search for a specific product.

Here are the search results. We can see there's a variety of goose plushies available.
Let's click on the first result.

shots.selector: h2:contains('Gund Baby Gundersson Goose Plush Stuffed Animal')

narration.en:
Let's check out the reviews to get a better idea of the product. Looks like a great choice!
We can also see the product details and specs here.

After reviewing, we can easily add the item to our cart for checkout.
Great, it's in our cart now!

coverage: This demo showcases the homepage, search functionality, product details, reviews, and adding an item to the cart.
assumptions: Basic website functionality and interactivity are available and stable.
Search results for 'goose plushie' remain relevant and available.
risks: The specific product chosen may not be available or relevant in the future.
Users might require more time to read and understand the content, especially if they're new to the website.

segments.text: We're on the Amazon.ca homepage. We can see various categories and a search bar. Let's initiate a search.
We searched for 'goose plushie' and got multiple results. We'll focus on the first product, 'Gund Baby Gundersson Goose'.
Checking the reviews is always a good idea. This product has great ratings! We can also view the specs and details here.
Adding this adorable goose to our cart is simple and convenient. We're now ready for checkout!
